title: [Question] Help me in deciding I have two options....
content:
1.. (Cse at ec campus) but I heard that for first-year students in PES EC campus in amaatra hostel we have to wake up as early as 6:30 and the return timings I don't know(what is the travelling time from hostel to college?)the curfew at hostel is 7pm
the 4 sharing rooms have bunker beds are there no 2 or 3 sharing rooms?? 
suggest some pgs near the college that cut down the travelling time...(not likely to join pg because my parents won't send me to pg)

2..cse(ai ml) at rr campus........  I heard it's very crowded at RR campus and getting the merit scholarship is harder(btw i need to get scholarship). Is it so crowded that even getting lunch is difficult?(I know competition is good but it's too much)

comments.body: If you're from Banglore, just pick the one closer to your house
